name: Dairy
unlockCondition: Access to milk supply, Cheesemakers' Guild membership
calculationsAnalysis: The Dairy processes imported milk into cheese, a valuable and longer-lasting food product. Construction includes specialized equipment for cheese making. Income is steady from cheese sales, with maintenance covering milk spoilage and production costs. Employs skilled cheesemakers.
shortDescription: A facility that processes milk into various types of cheese.
fullDescription: Dairies are essential for transforming perishable milk into durable and nutritious cheese. Using traditional techniques, these establishments produce a range of cheeses, from soft and fresh to hard and aged, catering to diverse tastes and culinary needs.
flavorText: Patience, a gentle hand, and the magic of time turn simple milk into a treasure worthy of any table.

soundDesign.ambientSound: Milk churning, presses, quiet aging room sounds

seasonalEffects.summer: Milk quality may vary, affecting cheese production
seasonalEffects.winter: Ideal conditions for aging certain cheeses
